name: .AXT File Extension
summary: Learn about .AXT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Color extraction file created by Photoshop, an image-editing application developed by Adobe Systems; contains information for replacing one color with another color; can specify the replacement's fuzziness as well as the hue, saturation, and lightness of the replacement color.

content: AXT files are used for saving and loading color replacement settings information. The Replace Color window can be opened in Photoshop by selecting Image → Adjustments → Replace Color....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
